text: for a `POST api/v1/cfssl/register`,  the authorization is  <enrollment certificate>.<signature>  ...
the enrollment certificate is the one from the enroll request of the registrar ?
signature is the signature over concat(enrollment certificate, request body) ?  or concat(request body, enrollment certificate) ?
<@U11CP8FF1> Good question.  One of the maintainers would need to do that.  <@U0PB67X4K> <@U11MANG9G>
<@U11CP8FF1>, <@U0S5KF44D>: Let me check and get back to you on this within the day.
<@U0UGH3X7X> Yes, signature of registrar and concat(ecert,body)
See <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-2012> for some info on CLI changes that I'm working on ... to use cobra/viper instead of cfssl's cli package
